events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because I no longer want the item.
The issue has been identified as a Refund request based on the customer's message indicating a desire to return the item.
Assigning this case to refund specialist team to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about your issue. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process for the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the wrong product you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. I have attached a photo showing the product I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
Thanks, I appreciate your quick help. I will send the item back as soon as I get the shipping label.
The refund has been processed and you will see the credit back on your payment method within 5-7 business days. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund successfully and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thanks again for the excellent support!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now, and thank you for contacting support.
